Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.modelView

Class ExpertFieldView

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.modelView.ExpertFieldView
public class ExpertFieldView extends Object
ExpertFieldView contains all information that are present only in an expert game, therefore it is used only for expert games.
